mapper.select: SELECT SEQ ,NAME, ADDR,TEL,CATEGORY,MENU,XPOS,YPOS,IMGFILE,DEL,CONTENT, SCORES, COUNTS FROM PMA_SHOP LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PSEQ, AVG(SCORE) SCORES, COUNT(SCORE) COUNTS FROM PMA_COMMENT GROUP BY PSEQ) CMT ON CMT.PSEQ = PMA_SHOP.SEQ ORDER BY SEQ ASC

SELECT shop.SEQ , shop.NAME, shop.ADDR, shop.TEL, shop.CATEGORY, shop.MENU, shop.XPOS, shop.YPOS, shop.imgFile, shop.DEL, shop.CONTENT, users.ID userid, users.SEQ userseq, FORB.forbs FROM PMA_SHOP shop, PMA_USER users, FORB WHERE shop.SEQ=#{seq} AND shop.seq = FORB.shop_seq AND FORB.id_seq = users.seq

SELECT SEQ ,NAME, ADDR,TEL,CATEGORY,MENU,XPOS,YPOS,IMGFILE,DEL,CONTENT, SCORES, COUNTS FROM PMA_SHOP LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PSEQ, AVG(SCORE) SCORES, COUNT(SCORE) COUNTS FROM PMA_COMMENT GROUP BY PSEQ) CMT ON CMT.PSEQ = PMA_SHOP.SEQ WHERE NAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR CATEGORY LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR ADDR LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'

SELECT SEQ ,NAME, ADDR,TEL,CATEGORY,MENU,XPOS,YPOS,IMGFILE,DEL,CONTENT, SCORES, COUNTS FROM PMA_SHOP LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PSEQ, AVG(SCORE) SCORES, COUNT(SCORE) COUNTS FROM PMA_COMMENT GROUP BY PSEQ) CMT ON CMT.PSEQ = PMA_SHOP.SEQ WHERE ADDR LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
mapper.update: UPDATE PMA_SHOP SET NAME = #{name}, ADDR = #{addr}, TEL = #{tel}, CATEGORY = #{category}, MENU = #{menu}, XPOS = #{xpos}, YPOS = #{ypos}, imgFile = #{imgFile}, CONTENT = #{content}
